properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 9 at 2:59PM EST until February 10 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5
inches.

* WHERE...Northern Oneida county.

* WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 11 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.

*ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest amounts will be across the higher
elevations of the southern Tug Hill Plateau. Steadiest snow will
be before sunrise, then snow starts to mix with rain after
daybreak.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM EST MONDAY
